Desc.entry: A voluntary group that works to improve park facilities. Organises regular meetings with local councillors and Parks and Countryside Rangers in attendance. Works to raise funds for various projects including redeveloping the old tennis courts. Has installed all-age gym equipment in the park. The group also helps the park rangers with tree and bulb planting and bridge building activities.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon at 7pm approximately every 6 weeks, please contact for details
